name: B. Maximum Cost Deletion
statement:
You are given a string s of length n consisting only of the characters
and .You perform the following operation until the string becomes empty:
choose some substring of characters, erase it from the string and glue
the remaining two parts together (any of them can be empty) in the same
order. For example, if you erase the substring from the string , you
will get the string . When you delete a substring of length l, you get a
cdot l + b points.Your task is to calculate the maximum number of points
that you can score in total, if you have to make the given string empty.
